content.prompt:
Hiapo, or Tapa Cloth (bark cloth & dye), Polynesian School, (19th Century) / Museum of New Zealand Te Papa Tongarewa, Wellington, New Zealand / Gift of the Right Honourable the Lady Rowley, 1980 / Bridgeman Images

In the work shown, a sense of rhythm and movement is created through the use of

choices.label: a horizontal and a vertical axis

topic.text: 9.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
